body: You gain a 10-foot-radius aura that helps dying creatures cling to life. Within this aura, a dying creature (including yourself) adds your Wisdom bonus to it stabilization checks (in addition to any other modifiers to stabilization checks).
name: Life Anchor
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Inquisitor/Inquisitions/Oblivion Inquisition/Granted Powers/Life Anchor
